title: Music - Background - Tropical Vol1
description: Immerse your game in the summer atmosphere with this pack of 20 tropical songs. Add sunny vibes and catchy rhythms to your games with these high-quality soundtracks!
longDescription:
🌴 Tropical Music Pack for Games 🌴


Youtube Demo: here


Immerse yourself in the vibrant and captivating rhythm with the Tropical Music Pack for Games! This pack contains 20 original tracks, carefully composed to bring a tropical atmosphere to your games.


Each song was created with the aim of providing an immersive experience, evoking the feeling of being in a tropical paradise. Whether for adventure, puzzle or simulation games, these songs add an extra layer of depth and emotion to your game.


Tracks vary in tempo and tone, allowing you to choose the perfect song for each scenario in your game. With varied melodies, this pack has everything you need to bring your game to life.


This package is Unreal Engine compatible and easy to integrate into your project. Add a tropical touch to your game today with our Tropical Game Music Pack!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Channel: 2 channels
  •  Additional: Stereo
  • Encoding: PCM

Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 bit

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 43:23

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://captainthatch.forgedream.com

Important/Additional Notes:
